name: Dots (itch) (Elronde, Dennis Chen, emvippy, oysterhey)
description:
How to play

After installing and running the game, there is a how-to-play section of the main menu that can be referenced before playing. These controls are also referenced here for convenience. 

Screenshots

This game features a screenshot button for both the web and PC. If you wish to share your work or save it after you are done, use that button to take a screenshot of it. Depending on the platform it will be saved to different places. Feel free to share your screenshots in the comments below!

Web

The screenshot feature will download the image automatically once the button is pushed. If you do not see it in your browser, look in your downloads folder.

PC

The screenshot feature will save the screenshot to the same location as where you extracted the files, under the folder "Screenshots".
